Name: Robbie
About the game: Robbie it's a hardcore platformer 2D that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills and patience. Each level has a unique and interesting mechanic that will challenge not only your skills but your ability to think outside of the box. The difficulty's not necessarily harder as you progress throughout the game. The controls are simple and you have only one simple goal, find the exit.
